thread.title: World Post Day: India Post's survival plan in e-mail riot

author: newsr.in
title: World Post Day: India Post's survival plan in e-mail riot
text: In a city like Mumbai, post offices now exist like mysterious relics for the net-savvy and email-enabled citizen. He looks at its counters, often dark, to wonder about the bygone era and ponder about times before the Internet. This trip of nostalgia often leads to two questions: Who writes letters these days? And what goes on in ... Â»
